data.eml:eml: Three new rotundabaloghid mites (Acari, Uropodina) from Sabah (Malaysia)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kontschan, Jeno (2014): Three new rotundabaloghid mites (Acari, Uropodina) from Sabah (Malaysia). ZooKeys 447: 35-45, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.447.8389, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.447.8389
